description: Approval of details of facing materials pursuant to Condition 03 of the planning permission dated 14/5/87 (86/1140) for the redevelopment of the site by the erection of 70 houses  flats and maisonettes namely Arlesley Gault mixture brickwork to buildings  Chailey stock and Haunchwood (Redland) boundary walls and Corey Stonewold roof tiles.
